messages.body: I'm having trouble accessing my course materials. Every time I try to watch the video lectures, they keep buffering and won't play properly

Hi there,

As a valued course participant, here are some quick resources that might help:

If you're experiencing technical difficulties or want to request a refund, you can access our support portal through your course dashboard. For immediate assistance with video playback, please try clearing your browser cache or using our recommended browser settings.

Need your invoice? Access your billing history here

Want to pause or cancel your subscription? Manage your subscription settings

Need to transfer your course to a different email? Just provide us with both your current and new email addresses.

Check out our Student Help Center for more solutions

Still stuck? Just reply to this message and our technical team will assist you right away!

conversation.subject: Video playback issues with course content
